entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
